name: PowerPlatformAssignUser
description: Assign a user to a target environment with specified security role.
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication via username/password is simpler to set up but won't work if your AAD tenant requires MFA; use Service Principal Name (SPN) if MFA is required.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformEnvironment
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with username/password. Does not support MFA.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformSPN
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with an Azure AppID, tenantID and client secret.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment URL or ID this task targets; default is the pipeline variable that e.g. the CreateEnvironment task has set before.

inputs.name: User
inputs.label: User
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure AD Object ID or user's principal name to assign to the target environment

inputs.name: Role
inputs.label: Role
inputs.helpMarkDown: Security role name or id to assign to the user

inputs.name: ApplicationUser
inputs.label: Application User
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the input user is an application user. If business unit is not specified, the application user will be added to the authenticated user's business unit.

inputs.name: BusinessUnit
inputs.label: Business Unit
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID of business unit to associate application user with.
